translations: n.座谈会；专题讨论会；酒会；专题论文集（symposium 的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: It sponsors lots of symposiums and a credibility project dedicated to wondering why customers are annoyed and fleeing in large numbers.
sentences.translation: 它赞助了许多研讨会和可信度项目，致力于探究为什么客户会感到恼火并大量逃离。

sentences.sentence: It sponsors lots of symposiums and a credibility project dedicated to wondering why customers are annoyed and fleeing in large numbers.
sentences.translation: 它赞助了许多研讨会和可信度项目，致力于探究为什么客户会感到恼火并大量逃离。

sentences.sentence: I do not particularly like symposiums.
